item.title: Understanding Trunk Ports
item.description: Understanding Trunk Ports: A Key Component in Network Engineering In the realm of network engineering, understanding the distinction between different types of ports is fundamental. Among these, trunk ports play a crucial role in managing network traffic efficiently and securely. In this post, we’ll delve into what a trunk port is, how it differs from an access port, and its importance in network infrastructure. We’ll also cover best practices for configuring trunk ports to ensure optimal security and performance.
